short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Open Graph meta tags and source code of any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MetaPeek is a browser extension that helps you quickly view and analyze metadata on any webpage. It's perfect for developers, SEO professionals, and anyone curious about how websites are optimized for social media and search engines.

✔ What MetaPeek Does:
• Displays Open Graph (OG) tags like `og:title`, `og:description`, `og:image`, and more.
• Shows general meta tags such as `description`, `keywords`, and `robots`.
• Provides a social media preview to see how the page will look when shared.
• Lets you copy metadata for easy documentation or analysis.

✔ Why Use MetaPeek?
• Time-Saving: No need to inspect the page source manually—MetaPeek extracts metadata instantly.
• SEO Optimization: Ensure your pages are optimized for search engines and social sharing.
• User-Friendly: View all metadata in one place with an intuitive interface.
• Lightweight & Private: No data tracking; MetaPeek only analyzes the active tab.

Whether you're optimizing a website, debugging metadata, or improving social media previews, MetaPeek is an essential tool for better web insights. Install MetaPeek and start exploring webpage metadata today!
